{T}: Create a Treasure token.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
{T}, Sacrifice two Treasures: Create a 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature token with four +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a sorcery.
{3}: Untap Subsidized Market.
